verbose_text: We monitored the presence of developing T cells in the thymus of 5 dpf larvae by evaluating the signal emanating from rag1 expressing thymocytes in both thymic lobes; on a per-cell basis, rag1 expression levels are the same in all genotypes analyzed, allowing us to use the rag1 hybridization signal as a proxy for the number of rag1 expressing thymocytes.
